subject: Olympic Games (2010)
Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The family of Kacey Bellamy, a defender on the U.S. hockey team, acknowledges that they would not be in Vancouver if it were not for the things they gave up along the way.
snippet: The family of Kacey Bellamy, a defender on the U.S. hockey team, acknowledges that they would not be in Vancouver if it were not for the things they gave up along the way.
